name: @elaraai/east-ui
description: East UI - UI components for East language

scripts.package: npm run build && mkdir -p .package && npm pack --pack-destination .package
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && node --enable-source-maps --test 'dist/test/**/*.spec.js' 'dist/src/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && npm run lint && node --enable-source-maps --test --experimental-test-coverage 'dist/test/**/*.spec.js' 'dist/src/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.test:export: npm run build && npm run lint && EXPORT_TEST_IR=1 npm test 2>&1 | grep 'Exported test IR'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:prepatch: npm version prepatch --preid=beta -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:preminor: npm version preminor --preid=beta -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:premajor: npm version premajor --preid=beta -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.version:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m 'chore: bump version to %s'
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prepatch: npm run version:prepatch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:preminor: npm run version:preminor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:premajor: npm run version:premajor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run version:prerelease && git push && git push --tags

author: Elara AI Pty Ltd
